story.label: Our Story
story.title: 25 Years of Fire Safety Experience
story.content: YANGIN PERDE combines more than 25 years of sector knowledge and field experience with modern building fire safety needs to develop functional, durable, and high-quality standard solutions.
story.content2: From residential projects to large-scale commercial buildings; from hospitals to industrial facilities, from educational buildings to special architectural applications, we handle every project with the same seriousness and rigor.
story.p1: YANGIN PERDE combines more than 25 years of sector knowledge and field experience with modern building fire safety needs to develop functional, durable, and high-quality standard solutions.
story.p2: From residential projects to large-scale commercial buildings; from hospitals to industrial facilities, from educational buildings to special architectural applications, we handle every project with the same seriousness and rigor.
story.p3: In every project, we evaluate the fire scenario, purpose of use, architectural compatibility, and international standards (EN, UL, etc.) together; we aim to produce systems that not only comply with procedures but also ensure full life safety.
story.p4: In design, production, and implementation processes, we work with architects, engineers, and fire consultants in a common-sense approach; we develop project-specific, correct, and sustainable systems rather than standard solutions.
story.p5: With our approach that views quality not as a choice but as a necessity; we care about establishing long-term partnerships in product reliability, correct technical details, and after-sales support.
story.p6: Today, we continue our way as a structure offering more refined, more selective, and upper-segment solutions on the solid foundation provided by past experience.

architectural.title: Engineering Approach
architectural.content: We handle fire safety as an engineering discipline. We detail every solution within the framework of risk analysis and technical requirements.

projectSpecific.title: Project-Specific Solution
projectSpecific.content: Instead of standard molds, we manufacture in special sizes and features suitable for the project's hazard class and architecture.

qualityStandard.title: Certified Safety
qualityStandard.content: We accept the compliance and certification of our products with international fire resistance standards as a fundamental condition.

collaboration.title: Expert Collaboration
collaboration.content: We work in close contact with fire consultants and project authors to produce solutions fully compliant with regulations.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: We manufacture our systems from sustainable materials that will work smoothly for many years and provide ease of maintenance.

afterDelivery.title: 24/7 Technical Support
afterDelivery.content: Fire safety does not accept interruptions. We ensure that systems are operational at all times with our after-sales maintenance and service.
